summary: I HAVE A 2002 CHEVY. TRAIL BLAZER LTZ MODEL # [XXX]  THIS VEHICLE SITS SO MUCH LOWER IN THE FRONT THAN THE BACK.  THE REAR VIEW MIRROR IS SO LOW IT OBSCURES THE LINE OF SIGHT TO THE RIGHT FRONT AREA WHILE DRIVING. MY WIFE AND I HAVE HAD THREE (3) NEAR MISSES WITH CARS IN INTERSECTIONS AND ALMOST RAN OVER A CHILD ON A BICYCLE COMING FROM THE RIGHT. THIS IS A DESIGN DESTINED TO CREATE AN ACCIDENT!   *JB    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
